import React from "react" import './style.css' const Todo = () => { const [check, setCheck] = React.useState ([ { name: "CSS", completed: false }, { name: "JavaScript", completed: true }, { name: "Learn React", completed: false }, { name: "Learn mongoDB", completed: false }, { name: "Learn Node JS", completed: false }, ]) return (

CSS

JavaScript

Learn React

Learn mongoDB

Learn Node JS

) } export default Todo
